conbody.p: The Status bar is located at the very bottom of the application window and depends on the current authoring mode.

li.p:
In the WYSIWYG mode, the Status bar allows you to:
See the current position of the cursor in the document.
See the number of the current page and the total number of pages in the document.
Show/hide Markup, the Content Map and the Message Window using the buttons.
Switch between the Paginated and Normal views of the document.

fig.title: Status bar in the WYSIWYG mode.

li.p:
In the Text mode, the Status bar allows you to:
See the current position of the cursor in the document.
Show/hide the Message Window using the button.

fig.title: Status bar in the Text mode.
